name: The Priest and The Sword
description:
If you can comment the game, it would be great.

(Download the build for a better experience)

The Priest and The Sword is a game where you control a priest cursed with a sword that slows him down. Try to kill the boss to remove the curse!

Controle :

- WASD to move

- Space bar to dash toward sword

If you have the sword :

- LEFT CLICK to launch further

-RIGHT CLICK to launch closely

If sword is launched:

- RIGHT CLICK to make it go toward you

Art Asset : https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

Music : https://opengameart.org/content/chill-lofi-inspired
